description: Japanese martial arts terminology with kanji, romaji, and translations

terms.notes: Literally 'born before' - one who has walked the path before
Expert instructor, typically 6th Dan and above
Specifically used for Morihei Ueshiba, founder of Aikido
Highest teaching title, 8th Dan and above
Student who lives with the master

translations.it: luogo dove si pratica la via

terms.notes: Shi is avoided as it sounds like 'death'
Common response to indicate understanding and commitment
